postcontent:
I picked up this .22lr AR15 styled rifle in a trade and it's currently the only .22lr and .22lr isn't my thing so I'm selling. I am unknown of it's round count but, I have not fired it at all. It came to me in a rifle bag that didn't quite fit along with 2 28rd mags that will be included in the sale, (bag not pictured).

The upper and lower are both polymer with a polymer detachable carry handle. The upper and lower disassemble like any other standard AR15. The lower has metal trigger and hammer but the stock is fixed and is just polumer and is completely dedicated to .22lr only. Supposedly the upper will attach to a standard AR15 lower but, I have not tried it.

Cheapest I could find it new online was $359 before shipping and transfer costs + bag, I would like to sell for $300. Not particularly looking for trades but, I will not ignore any offer.

Located in Portsmouth, and can meet you most places in HR. Sale would require a BOS, a picture ID and a CHP/Voter ID.

If you're not familiar with the 35 Remington cartridge...
The .35 Remington is the only remaining cartridge from Remington's lineup of medium power rimless cartridges still in commercial production. Introduced in 1906, it was originally chambered for the Remington Model 8 semi-automatic rifle in 1908.  The .35 Remington is considered a fine round for deer, elk, black bear, and other medium and large game as long as ranges are reasonable.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Custom m&p9 chopped to glock 19 size grip
postcontent:
So here she is. There's a lot I love about her- she was a fun project and I'll probably do it again sometime. I owned a compact m&p and sold it to buy this full size and chop it. 
The good:
Shoots like a full size carries like a compact. 
15 round mags
No failures ever. 
Custom- can't buy it anywhere. 
Larger upper negates the felt recoil more than the compact. 
You'll notice the baseplates on the magazines are slightly larger than the grip- initially I planned on radiussing it flush but realized I really liked the way it framed my grip every time I grabbed it. 
Undercut trigger guard 
Night sights with lots of life left 

Cons:
Nothing too bad- I did this over about a week on my lunch breaks at work so the magazines have detectable work done on them (when I was planning it I wanted to hide the chops)
I currently one have one blackstrap cut to size but could easily do the other two if you're interested. 
The pin that holds the backstrap in doesn't have anything to lock into anymore so it is just lodged snug in there- I have never had any problems with it wanting to come loose but from a fab standpoint I wish there was a better way- some people epoxy the backstrap to the grip but I wanted to still be able to interchange them.  
Lastly as I took a pic of the front sight for you to see. Once in a while the fiber optic tube will slide out a couple of millimeters. It's never gone further than that or been a problem. They pick up light great and are bright. Back sights are at about 95%-100%. Front is probably 80%-90%. 
The picture doesn't do the night sights justice but I thought is try. 

There she is. I tried to include every good and bad about her because surprises are no fun in this case. I only have a 200-300 rounds through her but no problems. Let me know your thoughts. 
Just throwing it out there to see if there's any interest. 


I could stipple the grip and bob the beavertail for an extra fee. 
Feel free to contact me if you are interested in having any work done to your polymer pistols. My rates are low since I love the projects. 
Thanks 

Since my post I bobbed the beaver tail for more comfortable carry and gave it a nice trigger job giving it a smooth crisp lighter trigger.

title: For Sale:  Anti-Personnel 44 Mag. Ammo - 200 gr. Hard Cast Wadcutter (1,300 fps) - 20 Round Box
postcontent:
https://www.extreme-impact-ammo.com/index.php?l=product_detail&p=283

This full profile wad cutter hard cast 44 magnum load was designed for the owners of 44 magnum firearms that choose to use those firearms for self defense against humans. This load is specifically designed to permanently and quickly disable humans. The big flat wad cutter nose crushes living tissue, unlike mushroomed bullets that are slightly rounded on the nose and tend to slip and slide through living tissue. The crushing action of the flat nose keeps penetration straight and when penetration is straight, it is generally very deep—deep enough to obtain full penetration on the largest human from any angle. The hard cast nose will not deform at these velocities so the nose profile remains constant (flat, with a sharp shoulder) along with bullet path and terminal damage. Noted NYPD “stake out” officer Jim Cirillo used full profile wad cutters in his 38 SPL revolvers because they incapacitated his human targets with certainty. See our item 20D. (38 SPL) The light weight bullet at moderate velocity aids in low recoil for fast follow-up shots.

Unlike our other Anti-Personnel 44 magnum loads, this one utilizes a hard cast bullet, which will not mushroom and the resulting penetration is very deep. Expect at least 24 inches of straight-line penetration in mammalian tissue, thus allowing this load to also serve well on small to medium sized game such as deer, black bear and even elk. This hard cast construction keeps your bore from being substantially lead fouled even after hundreds of rounds.

We’ve utilized a flash suppressed powder to the shooter will not be blinded by his/her own gunfire should you be required to drop the hammer in low light.

Note our real world velocities taken from stock over-the-counter firearms. We prefer to establish advertised velocities from real-world firearms and not from extra long laboratory test barrels that give false high velocities. You know what you are getting in the real world, where it matters, with Buffalo Bore ammunition.

1308 fps - Ruger Super Black Hawk, 5.5 inch barrel
1216 fps - S&W MT Gun, 4 inch barrel
1195 fps - S&W Mod. 329PD, 4 inch barrel

title: For Sale:  Utah CFP and Oregon CHL Concealed Carry Class 7/25/2014
postcontent:
Utah CFP Oregon CHL Concealed Carry Class

Friday, July 25, 2014 7:00 PM

Silver Dragon Martial Arts, 7881 SW Cirrus Dr Bldg 25D, Beaverton, OR 97008

Class cost is $65. Save $5 by pre-registering online!

Pre-Register Online: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-25-7-2014-Registration

This class covers everything you need to get your Oregon Concealed Handgun License and your Utah Concealed Firearms Permit. 

Our course exceeds all firearms safety training exceeds the requirements to obtain your Utah CFP, pursuant to Utah Code Title 53 Chapter 5 Section 704, and your Oregon CHL pursuant to ORS 166.291(f)(G). 

Our process starts with issuing you a packet of information, an application for your permit, and fingerprint cards that you will need. We will do your fingerprinting, take your passport photo and make copies of your driver's license before class starts. We do this so that upon completion of this class, you will have a complete packet which you can submit to Utah BCI (Bureau of Criminal Identification) with your payment. You will also have all the information you need to obtain your Oregon CHL from your local Sheriff's department. 

Subjects covered are: Basic Handgun Safety, Tactical Issues, Concealed Carry Firearm selection tips, Ammunition, Holsters, Gun Free Zones, Reciprocity, Cleaning, Storage, Firearm Transport, Justifiable Force, Criminal and Civil liability, How to interact with Law Enforcement, and how to apply for your Permit. 

After attending this class you will have a fundamental understanding about handgun safety and the rights and responsibilities and laws associated with the carrying of a concealed Handgun in multiple states. 

This is NOT a live firing class. Do NOT bring a firearm with you to the class. 

Even though the class time is only scheduled to be 2 1/2 hours long, there will be time for questions and answers after the class. 

More Information: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-25-7-2014-Schedule 
 Download a Flyer: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/ClassFlyer/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-7-25-2014.pdf 

If you are interested in just the Oregon Concealed Handgun License class visit http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/oregon-concealed-handgun-license-class-Training_Class

title: For Sale/Trade:  Webley Mark IV
postcontent: This is a Webley Mark IV revolver chambered in .38 S&W.  It has a 4 inch barrel.  The revolver was made under an Israeli contract with Webley & Scott LTD sometime after February of 1954.  The revolver has all matching serial numbers on the frame, cylinder and barrel and is in very good to excellent condition.  I have fired this revolver in the past and find it to be in good working order and reasonably accurate.  The gun is accompanied by a set of Lee reloading dies for .38 S&W, 250 pieces of new Winchester primed brass and just under 200 rounds of loaded ammunition.  All proof markings are sharp and my conservative estimate of the finish is 75-80%.  Grips are in great shape with no cracks or blemishes.  The hinge is nice and tight with a slight wobble in the cylinder which is to be expected from a top break revolver.  Rifling is strong and bright.  Contact me if you have any additional questions.

title: For Sale:  Taurus PT145 Millennium .45 ACP Semi Auto Pistol
location: Spring Lake Park, Minneapolis / St. Paul, Minnesota
postcontent:
Taurus PT145 Millennium .45 ACP semi auto pistol in good condition. 3" barrel is in good condition with good rifling intact. Blued slide is in good shape as well though bluing shows some light holster wear by muzzle and ejection port edges as seen in pictures. Nice starter semi auto or cheaper end dependable carry gun. Includes factory hard case, one 10rd factory magazine, and assisted magazine loader tool.

From Taurus:
We can think of a million reasons to add this highly regarded pistol to your belt, but for time's sake we'll just highlight our favorites. Like remarkable versatility. Non-stop performance. And your choice of models including: 9mm (12+1), .40 caliber (10+1), or .45 ACP (10+1 or 6+1 in a slimmer grip, single stack magazine sub-compact .45 at under 21 ounces). The Millennium PRO" also features the same revolutionary Single Action/Double Action trigger and matching serial numbers on the frame, slide and barrel as the 24/7 PRO, Heinie "Straight Eight" sights, an ergonomic grip design, enhanced finger indexing Ambidextrous Index Memory Pads" and posi-traction slide serrations. Light, powerful and technically advanced, the Millennium PRO is the choice for concealment and back-up carry.


Taurus Security System (TSS)s
Taurus family of semi-auto pistols now feature the Taurus Security System, which provides instant-ready defense with built-in ability to secure your pistol and make it inoperable at the turn of a key. When the Security System is engaged, the pistol cannot be fired or cocked and the gun's manual safety cannot be disengaged. As with our revolver Security System, the device is part of the firearm and cannot be lost, and the same special Security Key works for both the revolver and pistol Systems (two keys come with each gun). To engage: simply insert the Key into the button on the rear or side of the pistol and rotate one-quarter turn clockwise. This engages the Security System. The manual safety cannot be moved and the trigger cannot be pulled. To disengage: simply rotate the key one-quarter turn back. This releases the Security System, yet leaves the pistol's manual safety in the "safe" position until you are ready to release it yourself and fire the gun.








Loaded Chamber Indicator
Taurus provides a loaded chamber indicator on all new compact, medium and large frame pistols. As with all Taurus safety and security innovations, the indicator in no way interferes with the operation of your pistol and is provided at no extra cost, but gives you an "at-a-glance" verification that there is a round in the chamber. When a round is in the chamber, the ejector pops out of the slide, exposing a red strip just behind the ejection port. While any loaded chamber indicator is no substitute for common sense and safe firearm handling, it is one more example of Taurus' commitment to outstanding firearms.








Heinie Sights
Features the famous and genuine Richard Heinie "Straight Eight" Sight, using the rapid and accurate dot over the dot system








Accessory Rail
Features the Genuine Picatinny Rail allowing use of many accessories








New Unique SA/DA Trigger System
The PT24/7 Pro Trigger system solves the double action/single action dilemma once and for all. Figure 1 shows the trigger at full rest. When a round is chambered, the trigger sets in single action mode with the trigger traveling freely to the crisp break point shown in figure 2. The trigger resets to DA mode until another round is chambered.

Introducing the SIG556xi, rewriting the standard for modularity, reliability, and performance for the modern rifle platform. 

Based on the legendary SG 550, the SIG556xi will change the way military, law enforcement, and responsible citizens look at adaptable rifles. Utilizing the time-tested rotating bolt and adjustable gas piston operating system, the SIG556xi allows operators a choice of caliber, barrel length, handguard/stock configurations and lower receivers. 

A removable barrel allows the operator to select the necessary length for a given mission. Adding the appropriate bolt, the SIG556xi can be changed to any of three calibers, 5.56x45mm NATO, 300 Blackout, and 7.62x39mm NATO. Users can also quickly change out the non-serialized lower receiver, allowing the use of either AR-style STANAG magazines or rock-and-lock AK-style magazines. The SIG556xi upper receiver is the serialized part, making the lower an easy to purchase part. 

Polymer handguards accept all Magpul® light and rail kits, while the aluminum and carbon fiber handguards accept 2”, 4”, and 6” M1913 rails. Barrels are available in 10”, 14.5”, and 16”. Truly ambidextrous, the SIG556xi features an ambi safety selector, magazine release and user swappable charging handle (right- or left-handed). Optional receiver end plates allow for the use of either AR receiver extension tubes and buttstocks or M1913 compatible stocks

postcontent:
Super easy upgrade to any AR15 pattern rifle, brand new in package Magpul Battery Assist Device (one finger bolt release) lever. No modification to your weapon is made, it just mounts on the existing bolt release paddle and allows you to instantly drop the bolt after a magazine change with just a flick of your trigger finger while maintaining your grip. Will sell for $30 cash or trade for items that interest me, possible trades are listed below  

Developed from the operational experience of the Magpul DynamicsSM team, the B.A.D. Lever (Battery Assist Device) is designed to considerably improve the speed and efficiency of the AR15/M16 bolt catch. The B.A.D. Lever quickly addresses reloading and malfunction clearance shortcomings of AR15/M16 platforms by extending a paddle to the right side of the weapon, allowing manipulation of the bolt stop from the fire control/ready position with the right-hand trigger finger.

Made from milspec-anodized aluminum, the B.A.D. Lever attaches to the standard AR15/M16 bolt release without permanent modification to the weapon. Functional for both left and right-handed shooters, the B.A.D. Lever also allows traditional bolt catch manipulation according to the AR15/M16 manual of arms. All mounting hardware included.

title: For Trade:  Very Unususal AK-47 (AKM) (SOLD)
postcontent:
This is a Very unusual AK-47 (AKM). It has puzzled every single collector at every gun show I have brought it to. It is based on the Romanian "G"  Platform. It has an SVD sniper stock, and very attractive Bakelite Forarm furniture. It has original Bayonet lug. Perfect bore and action. It looks like it is set up to be a Sniper Rifle and has seen very little use. All parts are matching including original barrel. Wood and Bakelite magazine are almost a perfect match. Comes as you see with scopemount, sling and optic. 
(When ever I used to  bring it to the range, it would never fail to bring everyone over to look at it and try to buy it.) If you ever wanted an AK that stands out from the crowd and looks as beautiful as it shoots, this is the one! 

NOTE: I have had this since the 1980's so it is therefore EXEMPT from 922R compliance or control and is a "Pre-Ban" AK.

Cracks or missing pieces in your gun stock?
Our expert repair technician can repair your shotgun or rifle stock!
Through normal use and hunting shotguns and rifles can develop hairline cracks and sometimes breaking chunks out of the walnut gunstocks.

title: For Sale/Trade:  *ABSOLUTELY CUSTOM* Glock 35 Gen3 as ported 9mm
postcontent:
This listing is for a gently used and completely custom Glock 35 Gen3 pistol. It has had extensive work done and was purpose built from the ground up to be what it is. The build is about 8 months old and has approximately 400 rounds through it. The only parts that are stock Glock are the frame, the locking block, and the actual trigger. Everything else has been replaced and tuned. It is indeed in 9mm on a G35 slide, allowing for a heavier .40 to 9mm conversion barrel to be used to make recoil even lighter (effectively a medium barreled 9mm). The pistol is what is for sale, I will be keeping the magazines. The following modifications and parts were installed:
Glock Gen3 G17 frame
LWD Satin Chrome 3 pin set
LWD 3.5# connector
LWD 6# trigger spring
LWD Ultimate Trigger Stop
LWD Extended Magazine Catch
LWD Chrome Extended Slide Stop
LWD Chrome Slide Extended Slide Lock Lever
ZEV Tech 3oz (small) brass frame insert
ZEV Tech Speed Feed Magwell
LWD Stainless Glock 35 slide
LWD 6port G35 9mm stainless conversion barrel
LWD Lightweight Firing Pin for 9/357/40
LWD 4# striker spring
LWD Firing Pin Safety for 9/10/357/40
LWD Firing Pin Safety Spring
LWD Extractor LCI 9mm
LWD Extractor Depressor Plunger Spring
LWD Stainless Captured Guide Rod
LWD Extractor Depressor Plunger
LWD Extractor Depressor Spring
LWD Spring Loaded Bearing 9mm
ISMI 11# Flat Wound Recoil Spring
AmeriGLO Supressor Sights (you can co-witness)
Extensive slide machining, lightening and polishing
Custom Full Color Punisher Aluminum backplate
Custom Slide Melt

title: For Sale/Trade:  Kimber Combat Carry (Predicessor to the CDP line)
postcontent:
This was my number 1 carry gun for nearly 8 years.  Its an officers size frame, meaning its a 7+1 with standard mags.  It will come with 3 Wilson Combat 7rd mags as well as 1 8rd mag that is specific to the officers frame. It does not protrude any more than the 7rd as it has a low profile baseplate.  

The gun itself has roughly 2500 rounds through it, and I had changed out the recoil spring last June and put maybe 150rds through it since.  I have had a number of 1911's, and this can hold its ground against my fullsize Wilson any day, and in my opinion, its the more accurate of the two.  With the proper holdover, this thing will make 5" groups at 75 YARDS all day.  

The only ammo hangups I have experienced with this gun was with Cor Bon DPX hollowpoints, but it was only 1 in the 100rds of it that I shot.  I have shot it nearly 1200 rounds without any malfunctions down at Howe's pistol course and the worse report I could give of it was that it did start to slow down, but it did not jam up. 

The gun will also come with two holsters: A Bladetech paddle holster and a Krounds pancake style owb.  I also have an IWB Bladetech as well if that is what someone is looking for.

This gun is 1 of only 900 apparently, so it is not something that you see everyday. That being said, I wont sit here and try and convince anyone that its made of gold, however, I am not going to even entertain any lowball offers.  

I will also ask the buyer to present a valid drivers license as well as a current CPL. If you don't have one, I will not sell it to you. Just like things staying legal, safe and sane.

postcontent: This is a Finnish captured 1940 Russian 91/30 Izhevsk Mosin Nagant. It is a CAI import from the 90's.
